title: 1994년 United States v. James T. Strauser and Sidney L. Newell 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: United States v. James T. Strauser and Sidney L. Newell. 판결일: 1994-05-31. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. James T. STRAUSER and Sidney L. Newell, Defendants-Appellants
**판결일**: 1994-05-31
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Eschbach, Kanne, Posner

## 변호인

Rodger A. Heaton, Asst. U.S. Atty. (argued), Springfield, IL, for U.S., George F. Taseff, Harold M. Jennings, Ronald L. Lewis (argued), Jennings, Novick, Taseff, Smalley & Davis, Bloomington, IL, for Sidney L. Newell., Michael J. Costello (argued), Costello Law Office, Springfield, IL, for James T. Strau-ser.

## 인용

- 21 F.3d 194

## 판결문 요약

21 F.3d 194
    UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee,v.James T. STRAUSER and Sidney L. Newell, Defendants-Appellants.
    Nos. 92-1206, 92-1414.
    United States Court of Appeals,Seventh Circuit.
    Argued Feb. 10, 1994.Decided April 11, 1994.Rehearing Denied May 31, 1994.
    
      Rodger A. Heaton, Asst. U.S. Atty.  (argued), Springfield, IL, for U.S.
      George F. Taseff, Harold M. Jennings, Ronald L. Lewis (argued), Jennings, Novick, Taseff, Smalley & Davis, Bloomington, IL, for Sidney L. Newell.
      Michael J. Costello (argued), Costello Law Office, Springfield, IL, for James T. Strauser.
      Before POSNER, Chief Judge, and ESCHBACH and KANNE, Circuit Judges.
      ESCHBACH, Circuit Judge.
    
    
      1
      In this consolidated direct appeal, James Strauser and Sidney Newell challenge the district court's application of the Sentencing Guidelines to their convictions for conspiracy to distribute cocaine in violation of 21 U.S.C. Secs. 841(a)(1) and 846.  They assert that the district court erred in its computation of the amount of cocaine attributable to them under the Sentencing Guidelines.  We find that the district court properly calculated the amount of cocaine attributable to each defendant and affirm their sentences.
    
    I.
    
      2
      For several years, James Strauser and Sidney Newell were involved in a cocaine distribution network in Springfield, Illinois.  Their drug-related activities came to an unexpected end after Straus...
